attributes.action: Cancel Covid rules relaxation over Christmas to avoid more overwhelming of NHS
attributes.additional_details: Cancel this temporary relaxation that threatens so much harm as a consequence
attributes.background: Mixing of households as is currently planned to be allowed over the Christmas period will inevitably increase Covid numbers and overwhelm an already over-stretched NHS

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

Do not compromise the lockdown rules for Christmas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553660

Since you started your petition the Government has restricted the relaxation of Covid-19 rules over the Christmas period. You can read the current rules here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/making-a-christmas-bubble-with-friends-and-family/making-a-christmas-bubble-with-friends-and-family
